title: Hole - Reading Festival + Hollywood Palladium 1994 - Pre-FM
description:
Hole - 1994-11-09, Palladium, Hollywood CA + 1994-08-26, Reading Festival - SBD/Pre-FM - Love Story (Boot CD)

Live Through This Is Radio Hole!

Source: Love Story [boot CD]
Label: Chrome Hearts (#014 - 1996)
Location: Germany
Released: 1996
Duration: 76:51
[Rating: 9.5/10]

CD > EAC > FLAC > You
(extraction logfile included)

Transfer par moi thewaymouth aka mikedreams aka Mike Burns 4 U

[Today your Love, tomorrow the Hole world - ed.]


TRACKLIST:

- Hollywood Paladium

01	 Plump	
02	 Beautiful Son	
03	 Miss World	
04	 Asking For It	
05	 Hungry Like The Wolf	
06	 Gutless	
07	 Softer, Softest

- Reading Festival

12	 Plump	
13	 Never Go Away / Beautiful Son	
14	 Miss World	
15	 Jennifer's Body	
16	 Asking For It	
17	 Gutless	
18	 Softer, Softest	
19	 I Think That I Would Die	
20	 Credit In The Straight World	
21	 Teenage Whore	
22	 Doll Parts	
23	 Never Go Away


Complete FM sets but with censored radio edits of the shows.
____________________________________________________________


- Reading - Complete Show (SBD/FM)
8/26, Friday, Opening Night, 2 PM start, Main Stage: Cypress Hill, Lemonheads, Frank Black, Pavement, Hole, Gang Starr, Trans-Global Underground, The Verve, The Flaming Lips

First full performance after the deaths of Kristen Pfaff and Kurt Cobain. 
First full Hole performance with Melissa Auf Der Maur on bass.
First full show of the Live Through This Tour. 
First big gig of one of the greatest tours of all time, is what it all means to me. [And I have a thirst for firsts] 

...And the Hole in the sky opened up, drowning out the day's sunshine summer sadness with bad moon madness melting down and in and away. 


- Palladium - Incomplete (complete show not aired) [Westwood One, SBD/Pre-FM] {Censored radio edit; 4 songs then break for commercials}

Full Palladium Show (per holelive.com)
Setlist:
1. Plump
2. Beautiful Son
3. Miss World
4. Asking For It
5. Hungry Like the Wolf
6. Gutless
7. Jennifer's Body
8. Softer, Softest
9. I Think That I Would Die/Hush Little Baby
10. Pretty On the Inside
11. Credit In the Straight World
12. Teenage Whore
13. Doll Parts
14. Violet
15. Unknown
16. Where Did You Sleep Last Night?

Hollywood Palladium, 6215 Sunset Boulevard, Hollywood, CA, US

Per wiki, The Hollywood Palladium was built in a Streamline Moderne, Art Deco style and includes an 11,200 square foot dance floor with room for up to 4,000 people.

"...I feel like I'm back in Jumbo's Clown Room [with] just a bigger crowd." - CL

[Jumbo's Clown Room (Exotic Dance Bar), 5153 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles
________________________________________________________________________

Hole
    Backing Vocals Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Melissa Auf Der Maur

    Drums Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Patty Schemel
    Guitar Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Courtney Love, Eric Erlandson
    Vocals Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Courtney Love


2014-04-12 thewaymouth on The Pirate Bay

"It was 20 years ago today." 

LOVE HAPPY LIVE THROUGH THIS DAY!


Hole's 2nd album, 'Live Through This,' released 1994-04-12, but one week after Kurt's exit stage upstage Hole.  

The Live Through This Tour was major delayed but once it got going, it was one of the wildest and craziest and best tours of all time. 

The crowds are so into it. The band is so into them. 

The rhythm section thunders. Eric is all electric lightning strikes. And just a singer in a rock and roll band is but Miss World. You can watch how Miss Olympia mounts Mount Olympus. By Zeus, this is Hera's era now. 

Courtney rules her court with fine fiddle, in great voice and super humor, with 'come on, abandon!' Love is all around, totally out of and always in complete control. Out of the fire and into the... fire away! 

This for now is the best band in Seattle and all the world. This is hers. 

You shoulda been there. Hole are the loud bang theory of fast, nasty & loose, punk/pop intelligence. The fast and funny, last blast that lasts. Lollapalooza 1995-07-25 was my date with destiny with the goddess. Seeing and hearing is believing there is a Hole in the center of my universe. That "if you live through this with me, I swear that I would die for you."

"I want to be the girl with the most cake."

____________________________________________
